titleStmt.title: Work for Cooper, or A bone for the doctour to pick; being an ansvver to a scurrilous pamphlet, entituled, The asse beaten for bawling.
titleStmt.author: Dauncey, John, fl. 1663.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "To you sir, cause you're of those shallow-brains ..."
In response to Edmund Cooper's The asse beaten for bawling.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
